; PATH=/etc/bind/zones/db.internet64.org
; 
; DNS Zone file for internet64.org using DNS setup Default
;
; This file is automatically generated CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN!
;
$TTL 600
internet64.org.      IN      SOA     dns1.internet64.org. hallam.gmail.com. (
                        2022102501       ; serial, todays date + todays serial 
                        3600              ; refresh, seconds
                        1800              ; retry, seconds
                        3600000              ; expire, seconds
                        600 )            ; minimum, seconds

; Additional name servers
internet64.org.     IN      NS      dns1.internet64.org.
dns1.internet64.org.    A 178.62.79.124 
internet64.org.     IN      NS      dns2.internet64.org.
dns2.internet64.org.    A 139.59.200.120 


internet64.org.    IN     CAA 0 issue "comodoca.com"
internet64.org.    IN     CAA 0 issue "letsencrypt.org"
internet64.org.    IN     CAA 0 issuewild  ";"
internet64.org.    IN     CAA 0 iodef "mailto:hostmaster@hallambaker.com"

; Hardcoded A records

; For now, forward all mail to a forwarder on the authoritative
internet64.org.       IN      MX       1 smtp1.hallambaker.com.


; Host host1.mathmesh.com 108.7.201.148 
internet64.org.    A 108.7.201.148 
www.internet64.org.    A 108.7.201.148 
http.internet64.org.    A 108.7.201.148
https.internet64.org.    A 108.7.201.148 
_http._tcp.internet64.org.  IN    SRV 1 1 80 host1.mathmesh.com.
_https._tcp.internet64.org.   IN   SRV 1 1 443 host1.mathmesh.com.
